transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Welcome to the O2 messaging service. The person you are calling is unable to take your call. Please leave your message after the tone. To re record your message key hash at any time.
Speaker B: Hi Kushan, this is. I'm calling regarding your accommodation. I can see you applied your applied for accommodation University College London portal and I'm calling for your accommodation. We have sent you the offer later but you haven't accepted it yet. Please accept the offer later or Revvert Back on WhatsApp 21 August Today is the last day to accept your offer letter. Please accept it and let me know when can I connect with you. Thank you so much.
